text: Ife tidamusankhira Mose masiku makumi atatu ndipo tinaonjeza masiku khumi ena, motero iye adakwaniritsa nthawi imene adasankhidwa ndi Ambuye wake ya masiku makumi anayi ndipo Mose anamuuza m’bale wake Aroni kuti: Lowa m’malo mwanga pakati pa anthu anga. Uchite zinthu za ngwiro ndipo usatsatire njira ya anthu ochita zoipa
